summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of an AWS KMS integration layer using mocked AWS services (moto) and boto3. It covers key creation, alias handling, encryption/decryption, data key generation, signing, policy enforcement, grant management, rotation, tagging, multi‑region keys, server operations, and utility functions, ensuring correct handling of edge cases and error conditions.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable and secure KMS operations within the application by automatically testing all critical KMS functionalities, preventing regressions, and confirming compliance with security policies before deployment.
